Standard file attribute decoding functions¶

fstpy.std_dec.parse_etiket(raw_etiket)¶

parses the etiket of a standard file to get etiket, run, implementation and ensemble member if available

Parameters

raw_etiket (str) – raw etiket before parsing

Returns

the parsed etiket, run, implementation and ensemble member

Return type

str

>>> parse_etiket('')
('', '', '', '')
>>> parse_etiket('R1_V710_N')
('_V710_', 'R1', 'N', '')
